long_description: These short-finger Novara cycling gloves for girls offer young cyclists grown-up comfort for short rides and long tours. Foam palm padding covers high-impact areas for reliable shock absorption. Microsuede palms ensure comfort, natural grip and durability. Specially designed anatomic palms follow the natural flex lines of the hands for a non-fatiguing grip. Rip-and-stick wrist closures provide a snug fit.
